name: Mounika Uppalapati
title: Java Developer
tagline: Building scalable backend systems and enterprise applications using Java, Spring Boot, and cloud-native technologies
summary: Java Developer with 3+ years of experience building secure, scalable, and high-performance backend and full-stack applications. Skilled in Java, Spring Boot, Microservices, REST APIs, SQL/NoSQL databases, and AWS cloud deployment. Experienced in designing modular architectures, optimizing backend performance, integrating distributed systems, and collaborating in Agile teams to deliver production-ready enterprise software.

experience.description: Developing scalable backend systems using Java, Spring Boot, Microservices, and REST APIs. Implementing secure authentication, integrating SQL/NoSQL databases, optimizing application performance, and contributing to cloud deployments on AWS. Building distributed data-processing solutions and collaborating in Agile teams to deliver enterprise-grade software.

Developed and maintained backend services using Java and Spring Boot. Implemented REST APIs, enhanced database performance (SQL Server, DB2), and contributed to full-stack development with React and Angular. Integrated Kafka for inter-service communication and improved API security with Spring Security and JWT.

Built responsive web interfaces using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Bootstrap. Gained hands-on experience in API integration, Git workflows, and Agile development practices while supporting full-stack application development.

education.institution: Missouri University of Science and Technology
education.degree: Master of Science (MS) in Computer and Information Sciences

education.institution: Prasad V. Potluri Siddhartha Institute of Technology

certifications: Oracle Cloud Infrastructure 2025 AI Foundations Associate

projects.title: Self-Supervised Classification Network
projects.description: Implemented SimCLR for self-supervised learning to improve representation quality for downstream classification tasks.

projects.title: Driver Drowsiness Detection
projects.description: Developed a real-time drowsiness detection system using computer vision and deep learning to enhance road safety.

projects.title: Forest Fire Prediction
projects.description: Built a predictive ML model for forecasting forest fires using environmental data, including data analysis and visualization.

projects.title: Green Basket E-Commerce Website
projects.description: Developed a responsive e-commerce app with dynamic product listings, shopping cart functionality, and optimized UI/UX.

projects.title: Self-Budgeting App
projects.description: Created a cross-platform budgeting app with expense tracking, category management, and monthly summaries.
